definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: How long does it take to send an airmail letter to China?
sentences.chinese: 寄封航空信到中國要多長時間？

sentences.english: Please send this letter by airmail.
It usually takes fortnight by air.
sentences.chinese: 航空信通常要兩個星期。

sentences.english: How much does it cost to send an airmail letter to Australia?
sentences.chinese: 寄往澳洲的航空信要多少錢？

sentences.english: How much does it cost to send a letter to Hong Kong by airmail?
sentences.chinese: 寄航空信到香港要多少錢？
是航空信還是一般信件？

sentences.english: Any post office so long as I can send a letter by air-mail.
sentences.chinese: 只要是能寄航空信的任何郵局都可以。

sentences.english: How long does it take for an airmail to get to Manchester?
sentences.chinese: 寄往曼徹斯特的航空信得多長時間才能到？

sentences.english: We send the mail transfer by airmail.
sentences.chinese: 我們通過寄航空信件來辦理信匯。

sentences.english: I use email instead of airmail now.
sentences.chinese: 現在我用電子郵件代替航空信。

sentences.english: The woman opened her bag and pulled out a pile of airmail letters.
sentences.chinese: 女人打開揹包，掏出一疊航空信。

sentences.english: How long will it take by airmail?
sentences.chinese: 我寄航空信了。這個多長時間？

sentences.english: Mr. G: Airmail, or standard mail?
sentences.chinese: 你要寄航空信還是平信？

definition: ordinary mail (as opposed to air mail etc)
to forward (a message, letter, article etc)
to remit by post/remittance sent by post
